name: The Strongest Dragon in the Era of Beast Taming
summary:
Synopsis

The Earth Dragon God who created the land, the Yggdrasil that nurtures life, the Lightning Wind Leopard that darts through thunderbolts, the ever-changing Ragdoll, the apex of technology in mechanical battle armor, and the unparalleled Creator Divine Beast.
This is a world with a brilliant Beast Master civilization.
How can a young man who has crossed over to the Blue Star become a steadfast Dragoo in this glorious Beast Master World?

The Strongest Dragon in the Era of Beast Taming
author: CLKX
genres: Action, Eastern, Martial Arts, CHINESE NOVEL
